name: A_Winner_Is_You
description: Complete the story on any difficulty setting.

name: Consider_Yourself_a_Hero
description: Complete the story on the Challenging setting.

name: This_Story_Is_Happy_End
description: Complete the story on the Genuine setting.

name: Now_Go_and_Rest_Our_Heroes
displayName: Now Go and Rest Our Heroes
description: Complete the story on the Destructive setting!

name: You're_Winner!
description: Complete the story on the Catastrophic setting!!

name: Rock_Smashing_101
description: Complete the first mission in the story on any difficulty setting. Achievement might be a strong word for this one.

name: Destroyer_Destroyer
description: Complete mission five in the story on any difficulty setting, by wrecking a Destroyer Base.

name: Shred_with_Spread
description: Complete mission 14 in the story on any difficulty setting, by clearing huge rocks with the Spread Gun.

name: Annoying_Pests
description: Complete mission 18 in the story on any difficulty setting. So many fighters, but the right weapons can take them all down in time.

name: Earth_Defense
description: Complete mission 25 in the story on any difficulty setting. Defend Earth!

name: Rock_Smashing_201
description: Complete mission three in the story on the challenging setting, and show them it takes more than rocks to stop Earth!

name: Through_the_Front_Line
description: Complete mission 15 in the story on the challenging setting, by taking down a Destroyer Base with both Missile and Laser hardpoints.

name: Challenging_Earth_Defense
description: Complete mission 25 in the story on the challenging setting. Defend Earth with gusto!

name: After_That_Mothership!
description: Complete mission 38 in the story on the challenging setting, and continue your chase to the enemy mothership.

name: They're_Going_to_Miss_That
description: Complete mission 19 in the story on the genuine setting, and prepare for bad news.

name: Genuine_Earth_Defense
description: Complete mission 25 in the story on the genuine setting. Defend Earth with all you have!

name: Mission_(Nearly)_Accomplished
description: Complete mission 35 in the story on the genuine setting. With superweapons at hand, it's nearly over...

name: Bombs_Away
description: Earn a silver medal in mission ten in the story, by completing it with a spare unused ship.

name: Hit_'Em_Heavy
description: Earn a silver medal in mission 17 in the story. Use missiles including the Swarm to attack from a safe distance.

name: Just_Dropping_By
description: Earn a silver medal in mission 23 in the story. Magnetic mines will help tear apart the Destroyer Base with time to spare.

name: This_Weapon_Sucks
description: Earn a silver medal in mission 33 in the story, by using the Vortex Missiles to hold Destroyers in place.

name: With_More_to_Spare
description: Earn a silver medal in mission 40 in the story, leaving the Destroyers eradicated with Earth ships to spare.

name: Low-Hanging_Fruit
description: Earn a gold medal in the first story mission. Not much trouble compared to what's ahead...

name: Rock_Smashing_301
description: Earn a gold medal in mission seven in the story by clearing out a storm of rocks with no spare ships.

name: Sweet_Revenge
description: Earn a gold medal in mission 20 in the story to retaliate for what the Destroyers have done.

name: Don't_Let_That_Hit_You!
description: Earn a gold medal in mission 28 in the story. One enemy nuke is all it takes to blemish your record.

name: Survival_Expert
description: Complete all of the survival missions on the genuine setting. With no extra ships, these missions can be among the hardest.

name: That's_Gotta_Hurt
description: Earn a gold medal in mission 34 in the story. Use those heavy weapons right and even those tough bases will be taken down in no time.

name: High-Hanging_Fruit
description: Earn a gold medal in mission 39 in the story, turning what should be an epic last-breath battle into a one-sided crushing.

name: Rock_Smashing_401
description: Complete mission 14 in the story on the destructive setting to set a textbook example of rock crushing for the ages.

name: Destructive_Earth_Defense
description: Complete mission 25 in the story on the destructive setting. Defend Earth... if you can!

name: Destructive_Endgame
description: Complete mission 37 in the story on the destructive setting. Can you make it?

name: And_That_Was_Just_the_Warmup
displayName: And That Was Just the Warmup
description: Complete mission ten in the story on the catastrophic setting.

name: Catastrophic_Earth_Defense
description: Complete mission 25 in the story on the catastrophic setting. Defend Earth, if at all possible.

name: Catastrophic_Endgame
description: Complete mission 37 in the story on the catastrophic setting. Getting this far is a rare feat indeed.

name: Better_Than_Needed
description: Earn ten silver medals in the story by completing missions on genuine with ships or time to spare.

name: Sterling_Reputation
description: Earn 25 silver medals in the story to earn this poorly named achievement.

name: Need_Space_To_Hang_All_These
displayName: Need Space To Hang All These
description: Earn 80 combined bronze, silver, and gold medals in the story by out-classing the World Destroyers on the genuine setting.

name: WD_Pure_Silver_Story
description: Earn every silver medal in the story to prove your well-rounded proficiency against the World Destroyers on the genuine setting.

name: Tactician
description: Earn 18 gold medals in the story by completing missions on genuine optimally.

name: Almost_Perfect
description: Earn 39 gold medals in the story. One more to go!

name: WD_Solid_Gold_Story
description: Earn every gold medal in the story to prove mastery over every mission on the genuine setting.

name: Relaxed_Master
description: Clear the story with 50 or fewer ships lost per player. Now you're ready for the harder settings!

name: Challenging_Master
description: Clear the story on Challenging with 50 or fewer ships lost per player. It takes some consistent piloting to get through all those missions.

name: These_Numbers_Look_Right
description: Clear the story on Challenging with zero or fewer ships lost per player. Play well in the bonus stages to get into the negatives!

name: Genuine_Contender
description: Clear the story on Genuine with 100 or fewer ships lost per player. One hundred sounds like a lot, but those destroyers are tough.

name: Genuine_Master
description: Clear the story on Genuine with 50 or fewer ships lost per player. Practice those tough levels before trying this one.

name: Silver_Road
description: Clear the story on Genuine with 25 or fewer ships lost per player. Getting silvers is hard enough, but can you do it consistently?

name: Golden_Road
description: Clear the story on Genuine with zero or fewer ships lost per player. Even with the bonus stages, there's very little room for error.

name: Diamond_Road
description: Clear the story on Genuine with minus 19 or fewer ships lost per player! Only two ships per player can be lost or missed in this one!

name: Destructive_Contender
description: Clear the story on Destructive with 100 or fewer ships lost per player. Those restarts add up pretty fast on this setting!

name: Destructive_Master
description: Clear the story on Destructive with 50 or fewer ships lost per player. This one takes true mastery to pull off.

name: World_Destroyers_Run_of_Champions
description: Clear the story on Destructive with zero or fewer ships lost per player! If you get this one, let us know.

name: Catastrophic_Master
description: Clear the story on Catastrophic with 50 or fewer ships lost per player. Isn't clearing Catastrophic hard enough?

name: We_Fought_the_Horde_and_the_Horde_Won
displayName: We Fought the Horde and the Horde Won
description: Score 35 000 points in the Horde Mode with any number of players.

name: Six_Figure_Horde
description: Score 100 000 points in the Horde Mode with any number of players.

name: 250K_Horde
description: Score 250 000 points in the Horde Mode with any number of players.

name: 500K_Horde
description: Score 500 000 points in the Horde Mode with any number of players.

name: Million_Point_Horde
description: Score 1 000 000 points in the Horde Mode with any number of players.

name: Epic_Last_Stand
description: See a Perfect Destroyer in Horde Mode by reaching Wave 144. Nothing less will keep you down!

name: Back_To_Basics
description: Score over 20 000 points in Retro Mode with any number of players to get the high score. That's what it was all about in those days.

name: 50K_Retro
description: Score 50 000 points in the Retro Mode. The controls may be simple, but getting this far isn't easy.

name: Six_Figure_Retro
description: Score 100 000 points in the Retro Mode. We'll use modern tech to keep it from resetting to zero, but the rest is up to you!

name: WANNA_RACE?
description: Earn a medal in any race mission.

name: Space_Truckin'
description: Earn eight out of fifteen combined bronze, silver, and gold medals available from race missions.

name: Race_Ace_(In_Space)
description: Earn a gold medal in all five race missions.

name: Lead_'em_and_Sweep
description: Earn a medal in either of the minesweep missions.

name: Deep_Sweep
description: Earn a gold medal in both minesweep missions.

name: One_and_Done
description: Complete the story on any difficulty setting with just one player.

name: The_Me_in_Team
description: Complete the story on Challenging with just one player.

name: Power_of_One
description: Complete the story on Genuine with just one player.

name: Champion_Player
description: Complete the story on Destructive with just one player.

name: Where_No_One_Has_Gone_Before
displayName: Where No One Has Gone Before
description: Complete the story on Catastrophic with just one player.

name: Mine,_All_Mine!
description: Earn 60 (half) of the combined bronze, silver, and gold medals in the story with just one player.

name: Solo_Perfection
description: Earn every gold medal in the story with just one player. You can't lose any ships except for the final mission, which allows one.

name: One_vs_Infinite
description: Score 750 000 points in the Horde Mode with just one player.

name: Two_and_Through
description: Complete the story on any difficulty setting with exactly two players.

name: Back-To-Back
description: Complete the story on Challenging with exactly two players. The enemy threat is a little tougher than in solo, but together you can do it.

name: Power_of_Two
description: Complete the story on Genuine with exactly two players.

name: Partnership_of_Champions
description: Complete the story on Destructive with exactly two players.

name: Where_No_Two_Have_Gone_Before
displayName: Where No Two Have Gone Before
description: Complete the story on Catastrophic with exactly two players.

name: Half_and_Half
description: Earn 60 (half) of the combined bronze, silver, and gold medals in the story with a team of exactly two players.

name: Perfect_Pair
description: Earn every gold medal in the story with a team of exactly two players. You can't lose any ships unless you start with five or more each.

name: Two_vs_Infinite
description: Score 1 200 000 points in the Horde Mode with no more than two players.

name: Three_and_Free
description: Complete the story on any difficulty setting with exactly three players.

name: Triple_Team
description: Complete the story on Challenging with exactly three players. Some players may be better than others but everyone can help.

name: Power_of_Three
description: Complete the story on Genuine with exactly three players.

name: Trio_of_Champions
description: Complete the story on Destructive with exactly three players.

name: Where_No_Three_Have_Gone_Before
displayName: Where No Three Have Gone Before
description: Complete the story on Catastrophic with exactly three players.

name: Plenty_To_Go_Around
description: Earn 60 (half) of the combined bronze, silver, and gold medals in the story with a team of exactly three players.

name: Perfect_Trio
description: Earn every gold medal in the story with a team of exactly three players.

name: Three_vs_Infinite
description: Score 1 600 000 points in the Horde Mode with no more than three players.

name: Four_and_Finished
description: Complete the story on any difficulty setting with exactly four players.

name: Maximum_Capacity
description: Complete the story on Challenging with exactly four players. Team up to clear out the enemy clutter before it overwhelms your squad.

name: Power_of_Four
description: Complete the story on Genuine with exactly four players.

name: Squad_of_Champions
description: Complete the story on Destructive with exactly four players.

name: Where_No_Four_Have_Gone_Before
displayName: Where No Four Have Gone Before
description: Complete the story on Catastrophic with exactly four players.

name: Minus_80!
description: Accomplish the story on genuine with minus 80 or fewer ships lost! You need four players, and can only miss four ships!

name: Medals_for_Everyone
description: Earn 60 (half) of the combined bronze, silver, and gold medals in the story with a team of exactly four players.

name: Perfect_Squad
description: Earn every gold medal in the story with a team of exactly four players. You can't lose any ships unless you start with four or more each.

name: Two_Million_Point_Horde
description: Score 2 000 000 points in the Horde Mode with any number of players (four recommended). They just won't quit, but neither will you!

name: Lucky_7_Survival
description: Reach Wave 7 in Survival Horde mode.

name: Ultimate_12_Survival
description: Reach Wave 12 in Survival Horde mode.

name: Hold_On_a_Minute_While_We_Save_the_World
displayName: Hold On a Minute While We Save the World
description: Earn a gold medal in Challenge 3. Sixty seconds? Just Machine Guns? Earth at stake? No Problem!

name: Wanna_Challenge?
description: Complete every challenge from 1 through 5 on Genuine. It's Corkins Time!

name: Corkins_Solid_Gold
description: Earn gold medals on every challenge from 1 through 6. They're called challenge levels for a reason!
